item.title: 中国在高超音速武器的研发、测试和部署方面领先全球，超过了俄罗斯，而美国虽然已耗资 120 亿美元，但至今仍未部署哪怕一枚高超音速武器：晚间简报
item.description:
China leads the world in developing, testing and deploying hypersonic weapons, beating out Russia while the US, having already spent $12 billion, has yet to field even one: Here’s your Evening Briefing https://t.co/WDGGzFYCxp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 向唐纳德-特朗普的总统竞选活动捐款能让埃隆-马斯克受益吗？在本期《埃隆公司》播客节目中，我们将讨论为什么马斯克支持前总统可能对双方都有利。

Can a donation to Donald Trump's presidential campaign benefit Elon Musk?

item.title: 一个投资回报率高达 1900% 的投资者在持有日本股票时大多保持低调。现在，它开始公开提出一系列变革要求。
item.description:
An investor that made a 1,900% return mostly kept a low profile while holding Japanese stocks. Now it's embarking on a series of public demands for change. https://t.co/kkVqefjmWq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔（ArcelorMittal）同意收购钢管公司瓦卢瑞克（Vallourec）价值 10.4 亿美元的股权，以增加其在高附加值产品领域的投资。
item.description:
ArcelorMittal agreed to buy an equity stake worth $1.04 billion in tubular steel company Vallourec as it seeks to boost its exposure to more value-added products. https://t.co/xKVeThtBDU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 据熟知内情的人士透露，乌克兰计划提交一份提案，以进行必要的改革，从而释放欧盟承诺的大部分援助计划
item.description:
Ukraine plans to submit a proposal to enact reforms required to unlock most of the aid package pledged by the European Union, according to people familiar with the matter https://t.co/IeUA2yeQfC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 美国最大的加密货币交易所 Coinbase 表示，计划发行 10 亿美元的可转换优先票据，用于偿还现有债务和一般企业用途。
item.description:
Coinbase, the largest US cryptocurrency exchange, said it plans to offer $1 billion in convertible senior notes to repay existing debt and for general corporate purposes. https://t.co/eusfffVqQ9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 投资猫债券是 2023 年最赚钱的对冲基金策略。以下是一家公司如何利用科学来押注自然，从而赚得盆满钵满
item.description:
Investing in cat bonds was the most profitable hedge fund strategy of 2023. Here’s how one firm made a fortune using science to bet on nature https://t.co/TQ1rCHvyKc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 比特币的主导地位。风险投资荒。@emilyjnicolle 写道："这轮牛市有一些不对劲的地方。

item.title: 众议院将就因安全问题而迫使 TikTok 所有者 ByteDance 出售该平台进行投票，但找到买家可能并不容易
item.description:
The House is set to vote on forcing TikTok owner ByteDance to sell the platform over security concerns, but finding a buyer might not be so easy https://t.co/ATE4yE1KkT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 加拿大第二大省魁北克省预计，随着经济放缓和公共部门员工工资的上涨，未来几年的预算赤字将会增加。
item.description:
Quebec, Canada’s second-largest province, expects to have higher budget deficits for years to come as the economy slows and wages rise for public sector employees. https://t.co/HgQS8EyIR3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙将乌克兰推向欧洲议会竞选活动的最前沿

item.title: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，随着抗通胀战役的胜利，欧洲中央银行普遍同意在春季开始降息。
item.description:
There’s broad agreement at the European Central Bank to begin lowering interest in the spring as the battle against inflation is being won, says Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau. https://t.co/KvEeBhjV4G

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 收购公司 H.I.G. Capital 正在寻求 6.55 亿美元的债务融资，为其可能收购机械和工业清洁公司 USA DeBusk 提供资金支持。
item.description:
Buyout firm H.I.G. Capital is seeking $655 million of debt financing to help fund its potential purchase of mechanical and industrial cleaning company USA DeBusk https://t.co/n8euW55zmE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: Citadel 公司创始人肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）表示，美联储应缓慢降低利率，以避免日后不得不反其道而行之的可能性。
item.description:
Citadel founder Ken Griffin said the Federal Reserve should move slowly in lowering interest rates to avoid the possibility of having to reverse course later. https://t.co/VamBkIksZ9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 随着数字资产屡创新高，人们对提供比特币杠杆敞口的投资工具的需求正在飙升。
item.description:
Demand for the investment vehicles that offer leveraged exposure to Bitcoin is soaring as the digital asset hits record highs. https://t.co/ivSsIyWb82

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 随着波音公司面临的问题日益加深并在航空业引起反响，这家飞机制造商正进一步落后于其最大的竞争对手空中客车公司
item.description:
As the troubles faced by Boeing deepen and reverberate through the airline industry, the planemaker is falling even further behind its biggest competitor, Airbus https://t.co/SbutTwBluv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 可可期货盘中再创新高，在纽约首次突破 7,000 美元，因为供应问题推动了可可期货的上涨，但没有迹象表明这将缓解巧克力生产商的压力。
item.description:
Cocoa futures rose to a fresh intraday record, topping $7,000 in New York for the first time, as supply concerns drive a rally that shows no sign of offering relief for chocolate makers. https://t.co/G0DXjnKvER

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱伊总统的紧缩措施使阿根廷经济陷入衰退，阿根廷月通胀率连续第二次放缓
item.description:
Argentina’s monthly inflation slowed for a second consecutive time as President Javier Milei’s austerity measures push the economy into recession https://t.co/eLXX06NSVE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 戴夫-雷切特（Dave Reichert）从帮助抓捕杀人犯的警长，成为国会中代表西雅图郊区部分地区的少有的共和党人。现在，他面临着更大的挑战。
item.description:
Dave Reichert went from being the sheriff who helped catch a killer to becoming the rare Republican representing part of the Seattle suburbs in Congress. Now he faces a bigger challenge. https://t.co/kEN6PX3etL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 美国今年的石油产量增长速度将快于此前的预期，有助于在欧佩克及其盟国限制产量的情况下缓解全球供应压力。
item.description:
Oil production in the US this year will increase faster than previously expected, helping cushion global supplies as OPEC and its allies restrict output. https://t.co/SZrP1rrGcN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 旧金山正在简化将空置办公楼变为住宅的手续，此举旨在缓解该市住房紧张的状况，并重振陷入困境的市中心。
item.description:
San Francisco is making it easier to turn empty office buildings into homes, a move aimed at easing the city’s housing crunch and reviving its struggling downtown https://t.co/WbmddeFxKb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 据知情人士透露，由于利率攀升，凯雷取消了募集一只专门用于长期基础设施投资的开放式基金的计划。
item.description:
Carlyle scrapped plans to raise an open-ended fund dedicated to long-term infrastructure bets as interest rates climbed, according to people with knowledge of the matter. https://t.co/0AnaLLVM2z

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 由于洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin Corp.）能否在7月的最后期限前完成交付仍是个未知数，丹麦正在酝酿措施以缓解其新型F-35战斗机延迟交付的问题。
item.description:
Denmark is mulling measures to mitigate delayed deliveries of its new F-35 fighter jets, as it remains unclear whether Lockheed Martin Corp. will meet a July deadline. https://t.co/tAkQ4LmLKU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 欧盟计划利用冻结的俄罗斯中央银行资产所产生的利润，这一计划将在下周欧盟领导人讨论这一有争议的提案时面临阻力
item.description:
A European Union plan to use the profits generated from frozen Russian central bank assets will face resistance next week when the bloc’s leaders discuss the controversial proposal https://t.co/WelEMCYNY7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 利息成本导致美国 2 月份预算赤字增加，使联邦政府本财年前五个月的赤字达到 8,280 亿美元
item.description:
Interest costs are driving the US budget deficit wider in February, pushing the federal government’s gap to $828 billion for the first five months of the fiscal year https://t.co/WhfIkuLHVZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 白宫将公布向乌克兰提供数亿美元军事援助的一揽子计划，而争取国会提供更多援助的努力仍处于停滞状态
item.description:
The White House will unveil a package of hundreds of millions of dollars in military assistance to Ukraine, as efforts to secure more aid from Congress remain stalled https://t.co/MyuEIQAIhd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024
